name: Carrot Revenge
description:
You are RABBIT, a lonely survivor from an alien abduction, he doesn't know where he is or why,

After waking up, he realizes that he is far from home and that escaping is not an option.

In his bullet-hell journey, rabbit will encounter more than 10 types of enemies (and more than a thousand of them), 10 upgrade types, variable maps and enemies, bosses, loot, everything!

Follow through the history as you progress, remember, dying means restarting (roguelike).

Explore different builds and mechanics and more importantly, survive!
